title: Which currency has the greatest inflation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh boy. I only know the USD. It was $35 per troy ounce of gold from 1934 to 1971. Right now it's $1500, Nov 2019. Within the EU, it's the Hungarian Forint which is 1 USD to 300 HUF. The Indonesian rupiah is $1 to 14.1k IDR. The Vietnamese dong (don't laugh) $1 to 23.2k VND. These 2 countries participate in the global economy. There are other lower valued currencies but they somewhat non-participatory.
